song.title: If Only I Could
song.info:
sometimes there are things in life you can't change. sometimes you change things in life that had better never existed. let's make the world a better place to be. we would if we could.
this track made 2nd place at dialogos 2000's multichannel compo (http://www.dialogos.cc)
NOTE: this version of the track is the original version. there's also a short compo version in the party site.
